8 def move(req):
9  print("Returning [%s | %s]"%(req.power, req.duration))
10  rospy.set_param("/forward/power", req.power)
11  rospy.sleep(req.duration)
12  rospy.set_param("/forward/power", 0)

15 def move_forward_server():
16  rospy.init_node("move_forward_server")

18  print("ready to move forward")
19  rospy.spin()
